summary: Drakul armor re-texture giving a more dark \"Vampire Lord\" look.
descriptionHtml:
[CENTER][SIZE=6]Drakul armor re-texture[/SIZE]




[SIZE=4]I got permission from the mod author, to release this re-texture.[/SIZE]

[SIZE=6]Requirements[/SIZE] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31229/] Drakul armors [/url]



[COLOR=#4F81BD]
[SIZE=4]
Since it is my favorite armor mod, i wanted to improve this armor set to suit my taste for dark style armors, and giving a more \"Vampire Lord\" look.[/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER]

[SIZE=6]Modifications[/SIZE] 
[COLOR=#4F81BD][SIZE=4]Red re-colors while darkening the metal parts, i also added Reg Glowing eyes to the helmet, you can use whatever else helmets to fit your style :)

Red Eyes should GLOW in the dark :)[/SIZE][/COLOR]

[SIZE=6]Information from the required mod[/SIZE]
[COLOR=#4F81BD][SIZE=4]

*From Drakul armor page*
The drakul armor has a \"No cape\" version located in data/meshes/armor/DrakulArmor/No Cape folder.Just copy the files there over the ones in the \"DrakulArmor\" folder.
[/SIZE][/COLOR]

[SIZE=6]Location[/SIZE]
[SIZE=4][COLOR=#4F81BD]
*From Drakul armor page*
In a guarded Locked Chest(you will find the key on the spider named Athena) located North east of Kjenstag ruins.

Crafted from any forge assuming you have the Dwarven smithing perk for the Medusa armor and Daedric smithing perk for the Drakul.The armors are temper-able too.
[/COLOR][/SIZE]



[SIZE=6]To Install[/SIZE]

[COLOR=#4F81BD]Copy all textures into \":\\Skyrim\\Data\\textures\\armor\\DrakulArmor\" overwrite when asked[/COLOR]

[SIZE=6]To Uninstall[/SIZE]

[COLOR=#4F81BD]Restore original textures from Drakul armor mod file archive[/COLOR]



[SIZE=4]
Screenshots mods

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20022/] Hell Sword [/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31229/] Drakul armors [/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/41875/] Animated Enchantments Overhaul [/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30936/] RealVision ENB [/url]
[/SIZE]


[SIZE=6]Thanks and Credits[/SIZE]

[COLOR=#4F81BD]
Zerofrost - Amazing mod author
Bethesda - Amazing game
[/COLOR]
author: GRIMELEVEN
